snippet: A former New Jersey Republican official who once worked with Governor Chris Christie was found dead along with her husband inside their home, officials said on Friday, in what appeared to be a murder-suicide....

headline.print_headline: Former New Jersey Republican Official Shot Dead in Apparent Murder-Suicide
headline.main: Former New Jersey Republican Official Shot Dead in Apparent Murder-Suicide

lead_paragraph: A former New Jersey Republican official who once worked with Governor Chris Christie was found dead along with her husband inside their home, officials said on Friday, in what appeared to be a murder-suicide.
